title: Looking For A High Gold/Low Plat ADC to duo with
body: Hi Guys, I am a gold 2 support main. Have been playing support for a long time on and off and am now looking to climb the ranks. Would love to find a good ADC main to duo with as the problem I am finding at the moment is I am supporting a lot of auto fills. IGN is Ashal, feel free to add me or comment. I play most nights of the week and all day on my RDO's
